devdoc.custom:security-contact: security@example.com Note: Contribution amounts and targets are stored in wei, not ether units
devdoc.details: This contract enables confidential fundraising campaigns where contribution amounts remain encrypted on-chain. It leverages FHEVM to perform operations on encrypted data without revealing individual contribution amounts. Only authorized parties can decrypt specific values after requesting decryption. Key Features: - Encrypted contribution tracking using FHE - Decentralized fund management through ShareVault - Automatic token distribution for successful campaigns - Refund mechanism for failed campaigns - Time-based campaign deadlines

cancelCampaign(uint16).details: Only the campaign owner can cancel. This immediately unlocks all contributor funds and prevents any further contributions. The campaign cannot be finalized after cancellation.

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign to cancel

claimTokens(uint16).details: Contributors must first decrypt their contribution amount by calling requestMyContributionDecryption(). Tokens are distributed proportionally based on contribution amount relative to the target amount. Each contributor can only claim once.

params.campaignId: The ID of the successful campaign

contribute(uint16,bytes32,bytes).details: The contribution amount is encrypted and locked in the ShareVault. The actual amount remains private on-chain and can only be decrypted by authorized parties. Funds are locked until the campaign is finalized (either transferred to owner or refunded).

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign to contribute to
params.encryptedAmount: The encrypted contribution amount (must be pre-encrypted by user)
params.inputProof: Zero-knowledge proof validating the encrypted input

createCampaign(string,string,uint64,uint.details: Initializes an encrypted total raised counter and sets campaign parameters. The campaign owner can later finalize it after the deadline to distribute tokens or refunds.

params.duration: The campaign duration in seconds (must be greater than 0)
params.target: The funding target amount in wei (must be greater than 0)
params.title: The campaign title (must not be empty)

finalizeCampaign(uint16,string,string).details: This function can only be called by the campaign owner after the deadline. The owner must first call requestTotalRaisedDecryption() to decrypt the total amount raised. If the target is reached, a new ERC20 token is deployed and funds are transferred to the owner. If the target is not reached, all locked funds are unlocked for contributor withdrawal.

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign to finalize
params.tokenName: The name for the campaign token (required if target reached, can be empty otherwise)
params.tokenSymbol: The symbol for the campaign token (required if target reached, can be empty otherwise)

getCampaign(uint16).details: Returns non-sensitive campaign data. Encrypted contribution amounts are not included.

returns.cancelled: Whether the campaign has been cancelled
returns.finalized: Whether the campaign has been finalized
returns.owner: The address of the campaign creator
returns.title: The campaign title

getCampaignContributors(uint16).details: Returns addresses of all users who have made at least one contribution. Does not reveal contribution amounts.

returns.contribution: The decrypted contribution (0 if not decrypted)

getMyContribution(uint16).details: The contribution must be decrypted first by calling requestMyContributionDecryption(). The decrypted value is cached with an expiration time.

returns._0: The decrypted contribution amount in wei

getTotalRaised(uint16).details: Only the campaign owner can call this. The total must be decrypted first by calling requestTotalRaisedDecryption(). The decrypted value is cached with an expiration time.

returns._0: The decrypted total amount raised in wei

returns.totalRaised: The decrypted total raised (0 if not decrypted)

returns._0: hasContribution True if user has contributed

requestMyContributionDecryption(uint16).details: Initiates an asynchronous decryption process. The result will be available after the decryption callback is executed. Use getMyContribution() to retrieve the decrypted value.

requestTotalRaisedDecryption(uint16).details: Only the campaign owner can request this. Required before finalizing a campaign. Initiates an asynchronous decryption process. Use getTotalRaised() to retrieve the result.

devdoc.title: ConfidentialFundraising

HandlesAlreadySavedForRequestID().notice: Returned if some handles were already saved for corresponding ID.

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

NoHandleFoundForRequestID().notice: Returned if there was not handle found for the requested ID.

DecryptionFulfilled(uint256).notice: This event is emitted when requested decryption has been fulfilled.

cancelCampaign(uint16).notice: Cancels an active campaign before its deadline

claimTokens(uint16).notice: Claims campaign tokens for a contributor after successful campaign finalization

contribute(uint16,bytes32,bytes).notice: Make an encrypted contribution to a campaign

finalizeCampaign(uint16,string,string).notice: Finalizes a campaign after its deadline has passed

getCampaignContributors(uint16).notice: Retrieves the list of all contributors to a campaign

getContributionStatus(uint16,address).notice: Get the decryption status and cached contribution for a user

getMyContribution(uint16).notice: Retrieves the caller's decrypted contribution amount

getTotalRaised(uint16).notice: Retrieves the decrypted total amount raised for a campaign

getTotalRaisedStatus(uint16).notice: Get the decryption status and cached total raised for a campaign

hasContribution(uint16,address).notice: Check if user has any contribution to a campaign

requestMyContributionDecryption(uint16).notice: Requests decryption of the caller's contribution amount

requestTotalRaisedDecryption(uint16).notice: Requests decryption of the total amount raised for a campaign

userdoc.notice: A privacy-preserving crowdfunding platform using fully homomorphic encryption (FHE)
